title: Advancing mastery level
body:
So I dont know if this is a bug or it was a bug and they fixed it.
When I was advancing Darius to lvl 6 it worked with a random champion shard.
I did the same today when I wanted to upgrade Janna to lvl 6,but I cant do it anymore.
Kinda felt disapointing cause it's a waste of 1700 IP now :P

Bug or bug they fixed?

replies.body:
Increasing a mastery level via hextech would require a shard or permanent of that champion, or enough blue essences to fuse.  In this case, you wouldn't be using Tristana as a random shard.  Your option would be to disenchanting it for 195 blue essences which would put you to a total of 395.  

500 blue essence are required to unlock level 6, so you would have to find some more!  You could do this by obtaining another mystery shard like you did to receive Tristana shard, and disenchant the random shard or find one for Janna.  Our[ champion mastery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q5)guide provides some more details on how this works, but I hope that helps clear things up!

Why just dont put 2 tokens + worth of champ..

Well thanks for you answer :)
